title: [Widow's Beach, Sharks' Point]
description: A damp sandbar twists its way into the water heading out to a semiformed land mass, and the foliage of the shoreline juts outward, blocking the path further down the beach.  A collection of jagged rocks protrudes from the water, each sharper than the last.
